content: In the Harry Potter series, what magical sport do students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry play using broomsticks?

Quidditch! It's this really exciting game where players ride on broomsticks and try to score points by throwing a ball called the Quaffle through hoops guarded by the Keeper. There are also Bludgers that fly around and try to knock players off their brooms, and the most important part is catching the Golden Snitch, which is a tiny, fast-moving ball that ends the game when caught by the Seeker. It's super thrilling to watch and play!
